mapper.select: select * from animal_disease.b_avianinfluenza where ai_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime}

select sum(ai_inactivatedVaccine) ai_inactivatedVaccine, sum(ai_jointVaccine) ai_jointVaccine, sum(ai_jointImmuneAmountChicken) ai_jointImmuneAmountChicken, sum(ai_jointImmuneAmountDuck) ai_jointImmuneAmountDuck, sum(ai_jointImmuneAmountGoose) ai_jointImmuneAmountGoose, sum(ai_jointImmuneAmountOther) ai_jointImmuneAmountOther, sum(ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountChicken) ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountChicken, sum(ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountDuck) ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountDuck, sum(ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountGoose) ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountGoose, sum(ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountOther) ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountOther from animal_disease.b_avianinfluenza where ai_regionCode=#{regionCode} AND ai_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime}

select sum(ai_inactivatedVaccine) ai_inactivatedVaccine, sum(ai_jointVaccine) ai_jointVaccine, sum(ai_jointImmuneAmountChicken) ai_jointImmuneAmountChicken, sum(ai_jointImmuneAmountDuck) ai_jointImmuneAmountDuck, sum(ai_jointImmuneAmountGoose) ai_jointImmuneAmountGoose, sum(ai_jointImmuneAmountOther) ai_jointImmuneAmountOther, sum(ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountChicken) ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountChicken, sum(ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountDuck) ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountDuck, sum(ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountGoose) ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountGoose, sum(ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountOther) ai_inactivatedImmuneAmountOther from animal_disease.b_avianinfluenza where ai_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP by ai_regionCode order by ai_regionCode
